settings.description: Adjust this setting to alter the amount of logging.
Adjust this setting to change the name of the CommonCrawl dataset to be used.
Adjust this setting to change the categories the system uses. Beware: applying any changes made here takes a long time!

Change this setting to adjust the minimum probability for a document to be labeled as a certain category. Any probability below this threshold is labeled as 'other'. The value should lie between 0 and 1.
Change this setting to adjust the file format of intercity relation exports.
Adjust this setting to alter the default minimal strength of intercity relations, measured as the total number of co-occurrences.
